Uses of Class
org.kiji.schema.layout.KijiTableLayout

Packages that use KijiTableLayout
org.kiji.schema The main package for users of KijiSchema. 
org.kiji.schema.filter Row level filters used when reading data from Kiji tables. 
org.kiji.schema.impl Implementations for the main KijiSchema classes and interfaces. 
org.kiji.schema.layout Kiji table layouts. 
org.kiji.schema.layout.impl Implementation for Kiji table layout management.
